import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import blueBubble from '../../assets/images/circle-b.png' import greenBubble from '../../assets/images/circle-g.png' import logo from '../../assets/images/logo.png'; import './Join.scss'; const Join = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [room, setRoom] = useState(""); return (

Join

setName(e.target.value)}>
setRoom(e.target.value)}>
(!name || !room) ? null : e.preventDefault()} to={`/chat/?name=${name}&room=${room}`}>
) } export default Join;
